有幾則評論抱怨男調酒師不感興趣，但女調酒師很棒。她和我們聊了一整夜，給我們詳細解釋了葡萄酒，我們第二次去那裡時，她一直給我們帶來她個人的葡萄酒和巧克力樣品讓我們嘗試！

等不及明年再回去。
EN:
In a comfortable and warm environment in Taipei, taste selected natural wines, including orange wine.

The lights and decoration are in place.

There are several comments complaining that the male alcoholics are not interested, but the feminine winemaker is great.She talked to us all night and explained the wine in detail. When we went there for the second time, she kept bringing us her personal wine and chocolate sample for us to try!

Can't wait to go back next year.
